trans-unit.source: Provides a validation summary adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供验证摘要适配器类，用于 XHTML 适配器集。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
trans-unit.target: 中的控件适配器<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>命名空间提供 XHTML 呈现和处理的显示设备的各种上移动控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlValidationSummaryAdapter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对关联控件的强类型化的引用。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Called after an object, such as a form or a page, is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如初始化窗体或页面中，在一个对象，对象之后调用。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <xref:System.EventArgs>) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象 (由定义<xref:System.EventArgs>) 包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Displays the associated control and all of its child controls on the client.
trans-unit.target: 显示关联的控件及其所有子控件的客户端上。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>用于呈现服务器控件内容在客户端的浏览器上的对象。
